
=head1 NAME

finding_keyword_map

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 finding (character varying) - 
 keyword (integer) - 
 report (character varying) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

             Table "gcis_metadata.finding_keyword_map"
  Column  |       Type        | Modifiers | Storage  | Description 
 ---------+-------------------+-----------+----------+-------------
  finding | character varying | not null  | extended | 
  keyword | integer           | not null  | plain    | 
  report  | character varying | not null  | extended | 
 Indexes:
     "finding_keyword_map_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (finding, keyword, report)
 Foreign-key constraints:
     "finding_keyword_map_finding_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (finding, report) REFERENCES finding(identifier, report) ON DELETE CASCADE
     "finding_keyword_map_keyword_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (keyword) REFERENCES keyword(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
